name: flogo-tcp-write-activity
title: TCP Write Activity
description: Writes data to given TCP connection
author: awakchau@tibco.com

settings.name: network
settings.description: Type of the network. Supported types are: tcp, tcp4 (IPv4-only), tcp6 (IPv6-only), udp, udp4 (IPv4-only), udp6 (IPv6-only), ip, ip4 (IPv4-only), ip6 (IPv6-only), unix, unixgram and unixpacket. Default is tcp

display.name: Network Type
display.description: Type of the network. Supported types are: tcp, tcp4 (IPv4-only), tcp6 (IPv6-only), udp, udp4 (IPv4-only), udp6 (IPv6-only), ip, ip4 (IPv4-only), ip6 (IPv6-only), unix, unixgram and unixpacket. Default is tcp

settings.name: host
settings.description: Domain name or IP address of the host. Default is localhost

display.name: Host
display.description: Domain name or IP address of the host. Default is localhost

settings.name: port
settings.description: Literal port number or a service name like http, domain etc

display.name: Port
display.description: Literal port number or a service name like http, domain etc

settings.name: delimiter
settings.description: Delimiter will be appended to the message

display.name: Delimiter
display.description: Delimiter will be appended to the message

settings.name: customDelimiter
settings.description: If set, this will override the above Delimiter

display.name: Custom Delimiter
display.description: If set, this will override the above Delimiter

settings.name: writeTimeoutMs
settings.description: Timeout for TCP write operation in milliseconds. Default is 0 (no timeout)

display.name: Write Timeout (in millis)
display.description: Timeout for TCP write operation in milliseconds. Default is 0 (no timeout)
